required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Recombinant Human Growth Hormone Injection in Patients With Prader-Willi Syndrome
clinical_study.official_title: A Single Arm, Multicenter Phase III Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Recombinant Human Growth Hormone Injection in Patients With Prader-Willi Syndrome

collaborator.agency: Tongji medical college huazhong university of science & technology
The Children's Hospital of Zhejiang University School of Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the effectiveness of rhGH (Recombinant human growth hormone) injection for improving motor development in patients with PWS.

primary_outcome.measure: The change of the total motor quotient calculated by Peabody Developmental Motor Scale before and after treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Gross motor quotient and fine motor quotient calculated by Peabody Developmental Motor Scale before and after treatment
Change of height standard deviation score (SDS) by chronological age before and after treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 4 weeks, 13 weeks, 26 weeks, 39 weeks, 52 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Body weight change before and after treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 4 weeks, 13 weeks, 26 weeks, 39 weeks, 52 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of BMI (Body mass index) standard deviation score before and after treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 4 weeks, 13 weeks, 26 weeks, 39 weeks, 52 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Global quotient, locomotor quotient, personal-social development quotient, language quotient, eye and hand coordination quotient, performance quotient and practical reasoning change calculated by Griffiths Mental Development Scale
Bone maturation ( bone age/ chronological age: BA/CA)
Change of IGF-1(Insulin-like growth factor 1) SDS
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 4 weeks, 13 weeks, 26 weeks, 39 weeks, 52 weeks
Baseline, 4 weeks, 13 weeks, 26 weeks, 39 weeks, 52 weeks

arm_group.description: Drug: Recombinant Human Growth Hormone Injection /Jintropin AQ, 30IU/10 mg/3ml/kit, 0.5 mg/m2/d for the first 4 weeks, then 1.0 mg/m2/d for subsequent 48 weeks; by subcutaneous injection, once per day for total 52 weeks.No control.

intervention.description: Drug: Recombinant Human Growth Hormone Injection /Jintropin AQ, 30IU/10 mg/3ml/kit, 0.5 mg/m2/d for the first 4 weeks, then 1.0 mg/m2/d for subsequent 48 weeks; by subcutaneous injection, once per day for total 52 weeks.

facility.name: Tongji medical college huazhong university of science & technology
The Children's Hospital,Zhejiang University School of Medicine
Beijing Children's Hospital, Capital Medical University
